answers.answer: awh sweetie...i know how sad and terrified you must be watching your mother destroy her life.meth is a horrible drug to be addicted to...and the success rate of staying clean is not so good either.  your mom needs immediate attention...trouble is, while in active addiction...she is pretty much unable to make that "rational" decision to do something about it.  has your mom ever gone to an inpatient rehab?  sounds like she needs some long term treatment.i have one of each...a son addicted to meth...and a son who is bi-polar, so i kind of know what is going on in your mind, in your heart.
